content.title: Intro
content.content:
2012
Preceded by
2012
2013
Year
2014
Followed by
2014

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2013.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
? - Amon Hen 239 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
1 - Vinyar Tengwar 50 is published.
1-3 - Conference on Tolkien and His Works at the Valparaiso University.
19 - La Conexion Espa√±ola de J.R.R. Tolkien is published in Spain.
21 - The Hobbit: Armies of The Third Age is released online.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
30 - HobbitCon, at the Hotel Maritim in Bonn, starts.
? - Amon Hen 240 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
1 - HobbitCon, at the Hotel Maritim in Bonn, ends.
8 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released on DVD.
20 - Artist Quinton Hoover dies.
23 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey: Chronicles: Creatures & Characters is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
11 - 12 - Middle-earth Weekend at Sarehole Mill, Birmingham.
21 - The Fall of Arthur by J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
? - Amon Hen 241 is published.
? - Mallorn 54 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
11 - 14 - Tolkien Thing 2013.
12 - 15 - Mythcon 44 at Michigan State University, East Lansing.
? - Amon Hen 242 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
8 - 11 - Omentielva Lempea - 5th International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages in Helsinki, Finland.
26 - Narrator Gerard Murphy dies.
29 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Annual 2014 is published.
29 - Guardians of Middle-earth is released on Windows.

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - Parma Eldalamberon 21 is published.
6 - 8 - The Greisinger Museum has its Opening Ceremony.
12 - The Hobbit, illustrated by Jemima Catlin, is published.
12 - Tolkien Calendar 2014 is published.
20 - 22 - Oxonmoot 2013 at Lady Margaret Hall.
26 - Roverandom pocket edition is published.
? - Amon Hen 243 is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - The Riddles of The Hobbit is published.
5 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Activity Book is published.
5 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: The Movie Storybook is published.
5 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Official Movie Guide is published.
5 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Sticker Book is published.
5 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Visual Companion is published.
7 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Ultimate Sticker Collection is published.
7 - Middle-earth Envisioned is published.
11 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey Extended Edition is released on DVD.
20 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm's Deep is released online.
22 - Lewis and Tolkien: The Lost Road is aired on BBC Radio.
26 - The Wobbit is published.
30 - Tolkien: the Forest and the City is published.
30 - The Unofficial Middle-Earth Monsters' Guide is published.
? - Amon Hen 244 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
9 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released.
12 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released in New Zealand.
13 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released in the United Kingdom.
13 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug: Chronicles: Art & Design is published.
13 - The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug is released in the United States.
Years
2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016
